Nominal design task
===================

In this section we are going to demonstrate how you can set up a task 
for finding the values of circuit's design parameters that satisfy all 
design requirements in the nominal corner. All of the project files 
can be found in `demo/gui/miller/ <../../../demo/gui/miller/>`_

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   gui.task-nominal.project.rst
   gui.task-nominal.setup.rst
   gui.task-nominal.settings.rst
   gui.task-nominal.running.rst
   gui.task-nominal.results.rst
   gui.task-nominal.post.rst
